name: purescript-concur-starter
description: A template for purescript-concur. Uses Spago and Parcel.

scripts.dev: rimraf dist && spago build && parcel build --public-url ./ index.html
scripts.prod: rimraf prod dist docs && mkdir prod && spago bundle-app --main Main --to prod/index.prod.js && java -jar closure-compiler/closure-compiler-v20190301.jar --js prod/index.prod.js --js_output_file prod/index.js && cp index.html prod/index.html && cp -r css prod/css && parcel build --public-url ./ prod/index.html && rimraf prod && cp -r dist docs

author: First Last <youremail@gmail.com> (https://github.com/yourgithub)
